A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While a watchable movie this installment does everything it can to troll it's fans and destroy everything you love about the previous movies. This is cinematically better than the prequels\, but managed to accomplish something none of the prequels ever did. I now do not care what happens to the characters. I will probably see episode 9\, but I'm not going to be waiting with baited breath as I have for every other movie. This movie may well have killed the franchise.
